title: can't chose summoner spells and access chat window in lobby
body:
so basically, when I want to chose a role, my screen looks something like this 
any way to get the toolbars back?

replies.body:
That's pretty strange. Have you recently resized your client at all? This looks like it may be caused by resizing the client, so I recommend expanding it by grabbing it on the bottom right corner.

http://liblearn.osu.edu/tutor/help/resize_win.gif

Let me know if this works.
yup this worked. After I had made this topic, i loged in the game again, and relized, that my launcher window has been resized. Now it is back to normal! Thank you!
